title: Help League won't open!
body: Apparently, I tried to open league after reinstalling it (due to the client keep restarting) and after installing it, the client won't even open :( Please someone respond! Thank you.

replies.body: You're most likely running into some weird admin related errors where your OS isn't recognizing that League is a safe program. Check out the steps in this [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and you should be able to get League running again!
Wont wory :( I have mac and nothing pops up when i press the league of legends icon.
